round_1: ^Heya! How are you? My name's Otis! It's great to meet you!
^I like your profile pic, you look super nice.
^It's a real shame these phones don't have smell too. You can learn a lot about someone that way y'know?

g-1: ^Hey, so would you like to chat for a bit?
^It's so good to get to speak to someone new, I get a little stir crazy sometimes!
^There's only so many times you can read White Fang before you start looking for someone to talk to... or a Yukon forest to run in.

c-1: ^I'm more of a Lassie: Come home fan
^Oh, uh... yeah. I-I like that one too...
c-2: ^I've been meaning to read that one!
^You really should! It's so good it makes me want to bark!
c-3: ^I love that story, but Beauty Smith is a monster. >:|
^But Scott is such a good person, you need a terrible villian to show him against.

part_1: ^As you enter the Holbrook Shelter you see a little black and brown Dachshund playing with another dog.
^When you approach he notices you and gives an
^Oh hey! It's so good to see you! I
^ enjoyed our chat together. I was hoping I'd get to meet you in person.

g-1: ^That's Betty, she and I started a book club together... Only, we're the only ones to join.
^Oh, but it's still great to talk about new books!
^Say, do you have any other dogs at home?

s: ^Yes! A house isn't a home without a dog.
^No, one doggo is enough of a handful for me!

c-1: ^Oh how wonderful! I should have known. I can even smell them on you. Can you tell me about them?
c-2: ^That's a bit sad, but perhaps we could find another forever friend together?
